author: uink45
content: Hi, I want to add my notes to the GitHub repository - cohort-zero, do I just simply 'add file' or do i need a request?

author: ogenev
content: I guess you just open Pull request (PR)

author: potuz
content: <@848181786763984926>  just got the email with your PR, I think that project is 1) useful, 2) feasible in the relatively short time of the project 3) not trivial in that it pertains to different aspects of the protocol. In short I think it's great!
